   (vii) UYO requires 'O' level credit pass in English Language.  
(viii) UMYUK requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which 
must include Mathematics, English Language, Biology 
and any other two (2) Science subjects.   
(ix) BOWEN does not accept Agricultural Scienceas 
another Science subject.  
(x) TASUED requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one 
sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at two (2) sittings 
to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Biology and either Physics or Geography.  
(xi) OAU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit pas ses which 
must include English Language, Biology, Chemistry, 
Mathematics and one (1) other subject.  
(xii) UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Biology to form the 
core subjects, with credit passes in two (2) other 
relevant Science subjects at not more than two (2) 
sittings.  
(xiii) AAUA require five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which 
must include Mathematics, English Language, Biology 
and two (2) subjects from Physics, Chemistry and 
Agricultural Science  
(xiv) LAGOS accepts five (5)'O' level credit passes inEnglish 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any two (2) of 
Physics, Biology, Agricultural Science, Integrated 
Science and Fisheries/Animal Husbandry.  
(xv) FED-DUTSINMA accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
to include: English, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry 
and any one (1) of Physics, Geography, Health Science 
or Agricultural Science. A pass in Physics will be 
accepted.  
  
 UTME SUBJECTS    
(i) OOU requires Mathematics and one (1) other subject.  
(ii) EDASAB and BENIN accept Biology, Chemistry, Physics 
or Mathematics.  
(iii) EKSU accepts Agricultural Science/Biology.
